mapper.select: SELECT qna_reply_id AS qnaReplyId , crowd_qna_id AS crowdQnaId , qna_reply_content AS qnaReplyContent , publishe_at AS publishedAt , is_deleted AS isDeleted FROM crowd_qna_reply_#{crowdId} WHERE crowd_qna_id = #{crowdQnaId} ORDER BY crowd_qna_id DESC
